sourcesContent:
import i18n from "i18next";
import LanguageDetector from "i18next-browser-languagedetector";
import { initReactI18next } from "react-i18next";

const resources = {
  en: {
    translation: {
      placeholder: "City, date spot...",
      guess: "Guess",
      share: "Share",
      showOnGoogleMaps: "üëÄ on Google Maps",
      welldone: "Well done!",
      unknownCountry: "Unknown country!",
      copy: "Copied results to clipboard",
      showCountry: "üó∫Ô∏è Show map!",
      cancelRotation: "üåÄ Cancel rotation",
      settings: {
        title: "Settings",
        distanceUnit: "Unit of distance",
        theme: "Theme",
        difficultyModifiers: "Difficulty modifiers",
        startingNextDay: "Starting the next day!",
        noImageMode: "Hide country image for more of a challenge.",
        rotationMode: "Randomly rotate country image.",
      },
      stats: {
        title: "Statistics",
        played: "Played",
        win: "Win %",
        currentStreak: "Current Streak",
        maxStreak: "Max Streak",
        averageBestDistance: "Best Distances Average",
        guessDistribution: "Guess distribution:",
      },
      install: {
        title: "Sgamble",
        descritpionTitle: "App Install:",
        description: "Add Sgamble to Home Screen to play it easily!",
        instructionTitle: "Instructions:",
        instructionActionOk: "OK",
        instructionActionCancel: "Cancel",
        instructionActionInstall: "Install",
        instructionFirefoxAction1: "- open browser options ",
        instructionFirefoxAction2: "- add to Home Screen",
        instructionFirefoxNewAction1: "- open browser options ",
        instructionFirefoxNewAction2: '- select "Install"',
        instructionIdeviceAction1: "- on Safari, open the Share menu ",
        instructionIdeviceAction2: '- select "Add to Home Screen"',
        instructionOperaAction1: "- press the menu button ",
        instructionOperaAction2: "- add to Home Screen",
        instructionNotSupported: "Not supported by this browser.",
      },
      buyMeACoffee: "Buy me a ‚òï!",
    },
  },
  fr: {
    translation: {
      placeholder: "Pays, territoires...",
      guess: "Deviner",
      share: "Partager",
      showOnGoogleMaps: "üëÄ sur Google Maps",
      welldone: "Bien jou√© !",
      unknownCountry: "Pays inconnu !",
      copy: "R√©sultat copi√© !",
      showCountry: "üó∫Ô∏è Afficher la carte !",
      cancelRotation: "üåÄ Annule la rotation",
      settings: {
        title: "Param√®tres",
        distanceUnit: "Unit√© de distance",
        theme: "Th√®me",
        difficultyModifiers: "Modificateurs de difficult√©",
        startingNextDay: "A partir du lendemain !",
        noImageMode: "Cache l'image du pays pour plus de challenge.",
        rotationMode: "Tourne l'image du pays de mani√®re al√©atoire.",
      },
      stats: {
        title: "Statistiques",
        played: "Parties",
        win: "Victoires %",
        currentStreak: "S√©rie Actuelle",
        maxStreak: "S√©rie Max",
        averageBestDistance: "Moyenne Meilleures Distances",
        guessDistribution: "R√©partitions des victoires:",
      },
      install: {
        title: "Worldle",
        descritpionTitle: "Installer l'app:",
        description:
          "Ajouter Worldle sur l'√©cran d'accueil pour le retrouver plus facilement !",
        instructionTitle: "Instructions :",
        instructionActionOk: "OK",
        instructionActionCancel: "Annuler",
        instructionActionInstall: "Installer",
        instructionFirefoxAction1: "- ouvrir les options du navigateur ",
        instructionFirefoxAction2: "- ajouter √† votre √©cran d'accueil",
        instructionFirefoxNewAction1: "- ouvrir les options du navigateur ",
        instructionFirefoxNewAction2: '- s√©lectionner "Installer"',
        instructionIdeviceAction1: "- sur Safari, ouvrir le menu de partage ",
        instructionIdeviceAction2: "- s√©lectionner \"Sur l'√©cran d'accueil\"",
        instructionOperaAction1: "- appuyer sur le bouton menu ",
        instructionOperaAction2: "- ajouter √† l'√©cran d'accueil",
        instructionNotSupported: "Impossible sur ce navigateur.",
      },
      buyMeACoffee: "Offrez moi un ‚òï !",
    },
  },
  es: {
    translation: {
      placeholder: "Pa√≠s, Territorios...",
      guess: "Adivinar",
      share: "Compartir",
      showOnGoogleMaps: "üëÄ en Google Maps",
      welldone: "Bien hecho !",
      unknownCountry: "Pa√≠s desconocido !",
      copy: "Resultado copiado !",
      showCountry: "üó∫Ô∏è mostrar mapa !",
      cancelRotation: "üåÄ Anular la rotac√≠on",
      settings: {
        title: "Par√°metros",
        distanceUnit: "Unidad de distancia",
        theme: "Tema",
        difficultyModifiers: "Modificador de dificultad",
        startingNextDay: "A partir de ma√±ana!",
        noImageMode: "Oculte la imagen del pa√≠s para un mayor desaf√≠o.",
        rotationMode: "Gira la imagen del pa√≠s aleatoriamente.",
      },
      stats: {
        title: "Estad√≠sticas",
        played: "Jugadas",
        win: "Ganadas %",
        currentStreak: "Serie Actual",
        maxStreak: "Serie Max",
        averageBestDistance: "Mejor distancia media",
        guessDistribution: "Distribuci√≥n de aciertos:",
      },
      buyMeACoffee: "Ofr√©zcame un ‚òï !",
    },
  },
  eu: {
    translation: {
      placeholder: "Estatua, herrialdeak...",
      guess: "Asmatu",
      share: "Elkarbanatu",
      showOnGoogleMaps: "üëÄ Google Maps-en",
      welldone: "Ongi egina !",
      unknownCountry: "Estatu ezezaguna !",
      copy: "Emaitzak arbelean kopiatuta !",
      showCountry: "üó∫Ô∏è Erakutsi mapan !",
      cancelRotation: "üåÄ Ezeztatu errotazioa",
      settings: {
        title: "Aukerak",
        distanceUnit: "Distantzia unitateak",
        theme: "Gaia",
        difficultyModifiers: "Zailtasun aldagaiak",
        startingNextDay: "Aldaketak bihartik aurrera ikusgai!",
        noImageMode: "Ezkutatu herriaren irudia zailagoa egiteko.",
        rotationMode: "Errotatu ausaz herrialdearen irudia.",
      },
      stats: {
        title: "Estatistikak",
        played: "Jokatuta",
        win: "Irabaziak %",
        currentStreak: "Uneko seriea",
        maxStreak: "Serie Max",
        averageBestDistance: "Batazbesteko distantzia onenea",
        guessDistribution: "Asmatze banaketa:",
      },
      buyMeACoffee: "‚òï bat eskaini iezaidazu !",
    },
  },
};

i18n
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .init({
    resources,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    fallbackLng: "en",
  });

export default i18n;
